text: Ara ke besi an'yayakari tara ca'ite yake smarana kariye de'oya haya tara prabhura banisamuha, kintu se ta theke phire yaya ara bhule yaya tara hata dukhana ki agabariyechila? Nihsandeha amara tadera hrdayera upare abarana sthapana ka rechi pache tara eti bujhate pare, ara tadera kanera bhetare badhirata. Ara tumi yadi tadera satpathera prati ahana karo tara seksetre kakhano satpathera dike calabe na.
